title: The Mother Trip: Hip Mama's Guide to Staying Sane in the Chaos of Motherhood
description: In her last book, outspoken urban mom Ariel Gore offered help for real-world mothers. In The Mother Trip , she gives her inspiration, encouragement, and moral support to unconventional moms. In these essays, she bashes the stereotype of the "good mother" and encourages readers to follow their instincts and redefine motherhood in their own terms.
author: Ariel Gore
